unnormalised: Arre yaar, LaTeX mhakka doko dukhoi! Ek sade equation boroik gelear, ani atam mhaje document kiteak tori alien spaceship-ache control panel polleta. Hanv soput korta, `x^2 + y^2 = r^2` bhaxen kiteak tori itlo tras diunk favo naslem. Dusrea dissa MS Word vaprun hanv thamtha. Atam tori 2+2=4 zatach â‚¹ symbol taka soddun diunk computer science-an PhD zai nam. Kiteak tori hanv atam mhajea phone-achea calculator app vapartolom!
normalised: Arre yaar, L-A-T-E-X mhakka dok'ke dukhi deta! Eke sope equation boroik gele, ani atam mazo document konnache alien spaceship control panel bhaxen dista. Hanv shapath gheun sangta, x squared plus y squared equals r squared hacho khatir itlo tras lagcho nhoi. Zaiite zalear hanv M-S Word vaprun dis sortam. Atam tori don plus don char zatat mhonn rupee symbol ghalunk P-H-D computer science mhantuk zai na. Fuddem hanv maza phone-acher calculator app vapurtelom!
